ygData.subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic]
ygData.msgSnippet: This list is NOT for roleplaying games????? Why is it called EQ Magic then? Thought EQ was short for EverQuest, an on-line roleplaying fantasy game. Is there
ygData.messageBody:
This list is NOT for roleplaying games?????
Why is it called EQ Magic then?
Thought EQ was short for EverQuest, an on-line roleplaying fantasy game.
Is there another kind of EQ that I'm not aware of?

Drokk, da majikk trollie
Shaman on the Innoruuk server

"Michael J." wrote:

> That's exactly what I was thinking. Whoever the moderator is better delete
> this child from the list, otherwise several of the rest of us our about to
> leave. We aren't here for 'role-playing' games or to show off our newly
> found naughty words. We're here to share the magic of entertaining people
> and making them happy. If that's not your objective, it's time to leave.
> Willy Stevens, get some friends in the real world, if you can, but you'll
> first have to grow up.
>
> Mindbender
> puffasmoke@...
